intro: Othonnopsis kraussii, commonly known as the Cape daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and white petals. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It is often found in coastal areas and is adapted to arid conditions. Othonnopsis kraussii is valued for its ornamental appeal and is commonly used in gardens and landscaping.
